description: A large plastic water canteen, with a 2.5 liter capacity and carrying strap. A bit of ductape and cellulose provide suprisingly effective insulation for the contents.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A military-style water canteen with a 1.5 liter capacity.  Commonly worn at the hip. A bit of ductape and cellulose provide suprisingly effective insulation for the contents.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
